content.body: Andreas Kling: also, I saw you were looking at `file:` URLs, given that you're developing a new OS I'm not sure how much guidance Fetch could give, but presumably you want unix-y behavior? (Also made me wonder if you considered using a novel newline code point to mess with everyone.)
